import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {ImStarFull} from 'react-icons/im' import './index.css' const RestaurantCard = props => { const {movie} = props const {title, posterPath, voteAverage} = movie const imageUrl = `https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/${posterPath}` return (

  • {title}

    {voteAverage}

    • ) } export default RestaurantCard
